trans-unit.source: Operations on Blobs
trans-unit.target: Operations on Blobs

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure Storage provides REST operations for working with blobs in the Blob service.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure Storage provides REST operations for working with blobs in the Blob service.

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: In This Section

trans-unit.source: This section contains reference information for operations on block blobs, append blobs and page blobs.
trans-unit.target: This section contains reference information for operations on block blobs, append blobs and page blobs.

trans-unit.source: Operations on Block Blobs, Append Blobs and Page Blobs
trans-unit.target: Operations on Block Blobs, Append Blobs and Page Blobs

trans-unit.source: Creates a new blob or replaces an existing blob within a container.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new blob or replaces an existing blob within a container.

trans-unit.source: Reads or download a blob from the Blob service, including its user-defined metadata and system properties.
trans-unit.target: Reads or download a blob from the Blob service, including its user-defined metadata and system properties.

trans-unit.source: Returns all user-defined metadata, standard HTTP properties, and system properties for the blob.
trans-unit.target: Returns all user-defined metadata, standard HTTP properties, and system properties for the blob.

trans-unit.source: Sets values for system properties defined for a blob.
trans-unit.target: Sets values for system properties defined for a blob.

trans-unit.source: Returns all user-defined metadata for the specified blob.
trans-unit.target: Returns all user-defined metadata for the specified blob.

trans-unit.source: Sets user-defined metadata for the specified blob as one or more name-value pairs.
trans-unit.target: Sets user-defined metadata for the specified blob as one or more name-value pairs.

trans-unit.source: Establishes and manages a lock on write and delete operations.
trans-unit.target: Establishes and manages a lock on write and delete operations.

trans-unit.source: To delete or write to a locked blob, a client must provide the lease ID.
trans-unit.target: To delete or write to a locked blob, a client must provide the lease ID.

trans-unit.source: Creates a snapshot of a blob.
trans-unit.target: Creates a snapshot of a blob.

trans-unit.source: Copies a blob to a destination within the storage account.
trans-unit.target: Copies a blob to a destination within the storage account.

trans-unit.source: Aborts a pending <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, and leaves a destination blob with zero length and full metadata.
trans-unit.target: Aborts a pending <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>Copy Blob</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation, and leaves a destination blob with zero length and full metadata.

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified blob for deletion.
trans-unit.target: Marks the specified blob for deletion.

trans-unit.source: Operations on Block Blobs
trans-unit.target: Operations on Block Blobs

trans-unit.source: Creates a new block to be committed as part of a block blob.
trans-unit.target: Creates a new block to be committed as part of a block blob.

trans-unit.source: Commits a block blob by specifying the set of block IDs that comprise the blob.
trans-unit.target: Commits a block blob by specifying the set of block IDs that comprise the blob.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the list of blocks that have been uploaded as part of a block blob.
trans-unit.target: Retrieves the list of blocks that have been uploaded as part of a block blob.

trans-unit.source: Operations on Page Blobs
trans-unit.target: Operations on Page Blobs

trans-unit.source: Writes a range of pages into a page blob.
trans-unit.target: Writes a range of pages into a page blob.

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of valid page ranges for a page blob or a snapshot of a page blob.
trans-unit.target: Returns a list of valid page ranges for a page blob or a snapshot of a page blob.

trans-unit.source: Operations on Append Blobs
trans-unit.target: Operations on Append Blobs

trans-unit.source: Writes a range of pages into a page blob.
trans-unit.target: Writes a range of pages into a page blob.
